languages.text: {n}Друкари поднимается из кресла одним плавным, хищным движением.{/n} "Пришло время поговорить о том, что нас связывает. О том, через что ты успел{mf||а} пройти под моим неусыпным надзором".
{n}The Drukhari rises from his seat with the fluidity of a predator.{/n} "The time has come to discuss what binds us together. What you have experienced under my unflagging watch."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари поднимается из кресла одним плавным, хищным движением.{/n} "Пришло время поговорить о том, что нас связывает. О том, через что ты успел{mf||а} пройти под моим неусыпным надзором".

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋如同掠食者一般，以流畅的动作从座位上站了起来。{/n}“如今，是时候讨论一下，是什么样的原因将你我联系在一起，以及你在我无微不至的照顾下都体会到了哪些东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari rises from his seat with the fluidity of a predator.{/n} "The time has come to discuss what binds us together. What you have experienced under my unflagging watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋如同掠食者一般，以流畅的动作从座位上站了起来。{/n}“如今，是时候讨论一下，是什么样的原因将你我联系在一起，以及你在我无微不至的照顾下都体会到了哪些东西。”

languages.text: {n}デュカーリは、プレデターのようにスルスル動いて席から立ち上がる。{/n}「今度は、俺達を結びつけるものについて話し合おう。俺がずっと監視する中で、お前が体験したことだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari rises from his seat with the fluidity of a predator.{/n} "The time has come to discuss what binds us together. What you have experienced under my unflagging watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリは、プレデターのようにスルスル動いて席から立ち上がる。{/n}「今度は、俺達を結びつけるものについて話し合おう。俺がずっと監視する中で、お前が体験したことだ」

languages.text: {n}El drukhari se levanta de su asiento con la elegancia de un depredador.{/n} «Ha llegado la hora de discutir lo que nos une. Lo que has experimentado bajo mi infatigable tutela».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari rises from his seat with the fluidity of a predator.{/n} "The time has come to discuss what binds us together. What you have experienced under my unflagging watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}El drukhari se levanta de su asiento con la elegancia de un depredador.{/n} «Ha llegado la hora de discutir lo que nos une. Lo que has experimentado bajo mi infatigable tutela».

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari se lève de son siège avec la félinité d'un prédateur.{/n} « L'heure est venue de parler de ce qui nous lie, de ce que vous avez expérimenté sous ma supervision infatigable. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari rises from his seat with the fluidity of a predator.{/n} "The time has come to discuss what binds us together. What you have experienced under my unflagging watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari se lève de son siège avec la félinité d'un prédateur.{/n} « L'heure est venue de parler de ce qui nous lie, de ce que vous avez expérimenté sous ma supervision infatigable. »

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari erhebt sich so geschmeidig wie ein Raubtier von seinem Platz.{/n} "Es wird Zeit, darüber zu sprechen, was uns miteinander verbindet. Was Ihr unter meiner unermüdlichen Aufsicht erlebt habt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari rises from his seat with the fluidity of a predator.{/n} "The time has come to discuss what binds us together. What you have experienced under my unflagging watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari erhebt sich so geschmeidig wie ein Raubtier von seinem Platz.{/n} "Es wird Zeit, darüber zu sprechen, was uns miteinander verbindet. Was Ihr unter meiner unermüdlichen Aufsicht erlebt habt."

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, oturduğu yerden yırtıcı bir hayvan çevikliğiyle kalkıyor.{/n} "Bizi birbirimize neyin bağladığını, yorulmak bilmez nezaretim altında neler deneyimlediğini konuşmamızın vakti geldi."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari rises from his seat with the fluidity of a predator.{/n} "The time has come to discuss what binds us together. What you have experienced under my unflagging watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari, oturduğu yerden yırtıcı bir hayvan esnekliğiyle kalkıyor.{/n} "Bizi birbirimize neyin bağladığını, yorulmak bilmeyen gözetimim altında neler deneyimlediğini konuşmamızın vakti geldi."
